original_text: While they promise them liberty, they themselves are the servants of corruption: for of whom a man is overcome, of the same is he brought in bondage.
korean_text: 그들에게 자유를 준다 하여도 자신들은 멸망의 종들이니 누구든지 진 자는 이긴 자의 종이 됨이라

sentences.original_text: they themselves are the servants of corruption
for of whom a man is overcome
of the same is he brought in bondage
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그와 같은 자에게 속박당하기 때문입니다
